name.de: TinySnap: die Screenshot-Software, die jeder benutzen wird
name.fr: TinySnap: Outil de capture d'écran prêt à la production
name.pt_PT: TinySnap (Ferramenta de Captura de Tela Pronta Para Produção)
name.zh_CN: TinySnap：人人会用的屏幕截图软件
name.zh_TW: TinySnap：人人會用的螢幕截圖軟體

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Production-ready screenshots made simple for creators, developers and marketers.
short.de: Produktionsreife Screenshots für Kreative, Entwickler und Vermarkter leicht gemacht.
short.fr: TinySnap - Captures d'écran prêtes à être produites, en toute simplicité pour les créateurs, les développeurs et les marketing
short.pt_PT: Capturas de tela prontas para produção simplificadas para criadores, desenvolvedores e profissionais de marketing.
short.zh_CN: TinySnap 是为每个人，特别是创业者、开发者和营销者创建的屏幕截图软件，不需要任何的设计技巧就可以制作出精致优雅的屏幕截图用于社交媒体、产品介绍、帮助文档的发布。
short.zh_TW: TinySnap 是為每個人，特別是創業者、開發者和營銷者建立的螢幕截圖軟體，不需要任何的設計技巧就可以製作出精緻優雅的螢幕截圖用於社交媒體、產品介紹、幫助文件的釋出。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TinySnap is a production-ready screenshot extension tool created for everyone, especially creators, developers, and marketers.

If you are still taking traditional boring screen captures, now we have a better solution for you to turn your screenshots into captivating graphics aligned with your needs.

You don't need fancy design skills, all you have to do is select what you want, adjust the TinySnap preview, and you are good to share. It doesn't get simpler than this.

TinySnap is completely free to use, but if you need that a little bit extra, upgrade to TinySnap Pro.

With TinySnap Pro, you can unlock features like:
- Upload your screenshots to the cloud
- Create instantly shareable links
- Recover from the trash within 30 days
- Custom branding watermarks
- Advanced integrations
- Priority Support

Stay in touch:

Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/TinySnapApp
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/TinySnapApp
Read our blog: https://blog.tinysnap.app

Support:

Have any questions or feedback? Please get in touch with our support team at support@tinysnap.app.
